structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Office Of Jury Commissioner For The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Meals For Jurors In Accordance With Their Religious Requirements
law.text: The court shall provide, upon request of a juror, meals consisting of food or food products prepared in accordance with the religious requirements of such juror when meals would otherwise be provided during any period in which the jury has been sequestered by the court. The court shall inform the jurors of their rights under this section.
